name: S0ftW4r
description:
S0ftW4r is a twin stick arcade shooter set in the third dimension!

Using your Gravity Engine, shoot down waves of enemies on various surfaces, from spheres to space stations!

Enjoy the game? Join the discord server! discord.gg/mJCAaqtn6v

This game is under development right now, I just have a public beta as a demo while I'm working on it. The plan is to fill out the content that will appear in the full version's demo, then create a full, paid version for steam and other platforms.

Any support before then will be hugely appreciated!

Note for itch.io users: If you buy the game now at the $6 recommended price, I'll make sure to pass you a key when the steam version goes live!
